titleStmt.title: The East-India-trade a most profitable trade to the kingdom. And best secured and improved in a company, and a joint-stock. Represented in a letter written upon the occasion of two letters lately published, insinuating the contrary.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Errata on verso of final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
